DOC.brief_summary: Introduction : The frequency fetuses occiput posterior position labor approximately 20 % , 5 % remain occiput posterior end labor . Occiput posterior position associate high risk caesarean delivery operative vaginal delivery . The manual rotation promote rotation posterior anterior position propose reduce extraction rate . There randomised trial compare effect manual rotation expectant management . We propose protocol prospective , monocentric , randomise control clinical trial order show rate spontaneous vaginal delivery high manual rotation occiput posterior position expectative management . Methods : Every 37 week singleton pregnancy clinical occiput posterior position suspicion confirm transabdominal ultrasound full dilatation eligible . Participants randomise either prophylactic manual rotation ( experimental group ) expectative management ( control group ) . Based alpha value 0.05 gain 20 % spontaneous vaginal delivery , 238 participant need enrol . The primary outcome spontaneous vaginal delivery . Secondary outcome operative delivery rate ( caesarean section , vacuum forceps delivery ) , significant maternal perinatal mortality/morbidity . Analysis intention-to-treat average 24-month period .
DOC.brief_title: RMOS Study : Impact Manual Rotation Occiput Posterior Position Operative Delivery Rate ( RMOS )
DOC.criteria: 1. age ≥ 18 year singleton pregnancy ≥37 week gestation plan vaginal birth cephalic presentation occiput posterior position confirm ultrasound full dilatation 2. withdrawal consent
